title: Just the other day I was riding down Carolina Beach Road and a Wilmington Police Officer pulled up beside me at a stop light. I looked over and see the officer in the vehicle, later that evening I was in Carolina Beach and looked over at a Police Car and there windows was so tented you could not see the police officer in the car. Why do Carolina Beach Police Cars have to have such a dark tent on there vehicles? Doesn\'t it violate the state law?
